languages.text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} have a 50% chance not to increase {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Обладатель посоха получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Произвол судьбы. languages.text: 这根法杖的使用者获得致命印记{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。使用者的占卜类{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能力量{/g}有50%的几率不会提高{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}状况。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: 痛撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得。同アビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能。ディビネーションの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は50%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を増加させない。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+10

languages.text: El personaje que utilice este báculo obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Sepultar. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de adivinación del portador tienen una probabilidad del 50 % de no aumentar la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g}. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Der Führer dieses Stabes erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Anvertrauen. Diese Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Trägers der Prophezeiung-Kategorie haben eine Chance von 50 %, den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} nicht zu erhöhen. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Expédition. languages.text: Bu asayı kullanan kişi, Damga {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Kullanan kişinin kehanet {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinin{/g} %50 oranında {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulmasını{/g} artırmama olasılığı bulunur. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}
